review: Stick worked better than Apple TV until after two months the supplied Amazon 5W charger/power supply went intermittent. Charger tested bad on Kindle Fire too. Requested replacement, but was issued $19 refund instead, with no need to return failed hardware. We'll see how long the Stick itself keeps working. Glad to have Apple TV as a backup.

review: Love my Fire Stick. We ended up buying it at Best Buy since it wasn't in stock through Amazon. We haven't had any issues with the Wi-Fi as others have reported. Netflix does freeze occasionally but we have Amazon Prime so we mostly stream Prime Videos. My only complaint is that I feel like browsing on the TV is pretty limited. I find it easier to look at the Prime video available online and then add it to my to-watch list.Aside from Prime Video - we love the Vevo app for watching videos. It's almost like MTV is back (like what we old folks remember from the 80s and 90s.) I love the photo slide show. I have my phone set up to upload all my pics to the Amazon Cloud and then I can set the tv to play a slide show of all my pics. And we also use the tv as a "radio" and stream Pandora. We've already gotten a lot of use out of the fire stick. It's pretty awesome.
author: J. Harding
